name: Mahjong solitaire 3 tiles
description:
Mahjong solitaire "three pieces take" free
Mahjong solitaire is a Chinese classic game, it takes 2 pieces of the same tile, but it is a mahjong game that takes 3 pieces of the same tile or 3 consecutive tiles. Please enjoy this new idea game.
Mahjong Solitaire (Shanghai Mahjong, Mahjong Taipei, Mahjong Solitaire) is a kind of Chinese classic game, usually you will find two identical tiles, but this game has three tiles of the same tile or a series of tiles It is a mah-jong game that takes 3 cards. The aim is to remove all the tiles from the board. Different points from ordinary solitaire can be taken even if it is sandwiched. You do not have to find the end one. However, it can not be taken unless you select 3 pieces. Please enjoy this new idea game.
The way to take is the same pattern, such as 123, 234, 456, 567, 789, 111, 555, 999 of the same pattern, middle, middle, starting, etc.
Level 1 has 3 modes, and level 36 has 108 modes.
In addition to the mah-jong tiles, the design prepared pictures of cats etc. You can enjoy from children to adults.
The free version is up to level 20, but the paid version has level 40.

Added bonus game of alphabet design
